answers.answer: not having twins, just carrying very low and having extreme pelvic pain and I'm 24 weeks :/

I had twins, they are two.. I didn't go through none of that.. One was breech.. And the other one crossed like the letter t. At 35 weeks I developed preeclampsia and had to be put to sleep for the delivery.. Boy weigh 4_11 and girl weighed 4_9 almost went full term.. But not quite. Best wishes.. What are they names
I am so jealous of you!  I want boy/girl twins so badly!  I am just having 1 little girl.  Congrats though, and I am sure it's painful.. but just remember you get 2 sweet babies out of it in the end!
No im not but am a twin n i got a twin brother

question: Hey I'm 25 weeks expecting boy and girl twins in April...this week has been horrible with all this pain. I found out through this app here that it's called sciatica or something like that... lower back pain .. pain in right leg from thigh to knee ..pelvic pain on top of that .... ugghhhh.. anyone else having twins or experiencing this? ???
title: anyone else expecting twins ???
